message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today at a price of $12,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you, even more so than my asking price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to consider that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $9,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $10,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $9,500?
